visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data with a series name 'Rainfall'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and configure the legend, margins, and background settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes for better readability. The x-axis represents the months from January to December, and the y-axis represents the rainfall in millimeters. The data series is named 'Rainfall' and includes the monthly rainfall data. Custom colors are specified for the series and the chart itself, with a background color set to a light gray shade. The legend is positioned to the right and aligned vertically at the top, with custom styling applied to its items. Additional configurations include chart borders and plot borders for a cleaner look.
